t: nannio Comfy Video Baby Monitor, Wooden Grain Camera, Non- WiFi ...
s: I had been looking at a well-known brand of video baby monitor at a national retail chain store, but decided to do some research online before purchasing ... I am so glad I did. The Nannio was only slightly cheaper than the other brand but I was amazed at what else I got for my money.
We have the other Nannio monitor and camera as well, its a good brand and camera does what it say it'll do, so that's always a bonus.
